E

End - it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.Phase.PhaseType
 
endAction(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.Turn
Method that updates the board with the end action done It ends the turn It creates another end phase if the god power allows it It clears the player's opponent gods, so that they will not influence again the next turn unless they reset themselves as this player's opponent gods
endAction(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.SantoriniMatch
Method that receives the chosen cell from the client and passes it to the turn that will perform the designated specific end action allowed by the player's god card with the method endAction()
endGame(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.SantoriniMatch
Method that ends the game if the win conditions are verified

Constructor: when creating the end phase it sets the phase's type as phase type "End"

ERROR_TEXT - Static variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.View.CLI
 
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.BuildPhase
Updates the candidateBuildingCells in a standard way, allowing the chosen worker to build in any adjacent cell that is not occupied by any worker and has not a dome
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.EndPhase
An end phase does nothing when not decorated by a god power, so it does not evaluate candidate cells when standard (empty function to be overridden when god power influences the end phase)
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.MovePhase
Method that evaluates the candidate cells for a standard movePhase of any player and worker, collecting them in a list
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.Phase
Changes the candidate cells list of each phase according to its type.
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.ApolloDecorator
Method called by a decorated turn's movePhase, it adds cells to a list of candidate cells according to this god's power It adds the standard candidate cells and also the neighbouring cells occupied by opponent's workers
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.AresDecorator
Method called by a decorated turn's OptEndPhase, it sets a list of candidate cells that for Ares are cells that have blocks on them (not domes) and are unoccupied
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.ArtemisDecorator
Method used to get a new set of candidate cells list for the move phase after the first move is performed, removing the cell from which it started the turn
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.AthenaDecorator
Method called by a decorated turn's MovePhase, it sets a list of candidate cells that for Athena are standard when acting for its owner and when acting for the opponents are a list of standard candidate cells for a move, without the ones that would result in the worker moving up one level
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.AtlasDecorator
Method used by Atlas to set the candidate cells on which its player can build on.
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.DemeterDecorator
Method used to get a new set of candidate cells list for the build phase after the first build is performed, removing the previous cell on which the worker has built on
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.GodPowerDecorator
Method that evaluates the candidate cells for the decorated phase
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.HephaestusDecorator
Method used to get a new set of candidate cells list for the build phase after the first build is performed, it contains only the cell on which the worker has just built
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.HestiaDecorator
Method used to get a new set of candidate cells list for the build phase after the first build is performed, it removes the perimeter cells
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.MedusaDecorator
Method called by a decorated turn's EndPhase, it adds cells to a list of candidate cells according to this god's power it checks if the power can be applied, checking if medusa's workers have opponent's workers as neighbours and occupying lower levels.
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.MinotaurDecorator
Method called by a decorated turn's movePhase, adding to the list of candidate cells the standard ones and those occupied by opponent's workers if is possible to move them in the movement's direction
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.PoseidonDecorator
Method used to get a set of standard candidate build cells neighbouring the unmoved worker
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.PrometheusDecorator
Method used to get a standard set of candidate cells list for the move phase removing the ones that make the player move up if the worker had already built a cell before moving
evalCandidateCells() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.ZeusDecorator
Method used to get a standard set of candidate cells list for the build phase, adding the one occupied by the worker
